name: shotgun`em
description:
This is a prototype created in a week for our first group assignment in a Game Design introduction course at Future Games.

It was created by our small team: Savelij Ognev, Vincenzo Catano and Tove Carlund.

We are very happy with the results, as in only one week we managed to create an enjoyable experience and good foundation for building a game on top of it.

CONTROLS:

G - switch between keyboard and mouse / Gamepad

wasd - movement

RMB - shoot

R - reload

Space - dash
